short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your workflows with ChatGPT for reading, analyzing, writing, or creating anything

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The modelize.ai extension is a sidebar tool that provides a quick way to access AI capabilities, allowing users to utilize modelize.ai features on any web page.

Modelize.ai is a platform that offers AI agent/AI workflow capabilities, enabling users to build AI workflows using APIs based on models like GPT. The AI workflows provided by modelize.ai are mainly targeted at small and medium-sized enterprises, entrepreneurs, marketing, and business personnel, offering convenient and rapid generation and query services. Once users install and use the modelize.ai extension, they can quickly access modelizeâ€™s search and translation features on more web pages.
